Competitive salary and stock options

R$800/mo for you to use with food in supermarkets, restaurants and delivery

GymPass so you don't sit/work all day

Optional fully funded English / Spanish courses

30 days of paid annual leave

Education and courses stipend

Earn a trip anywhere in the world every 4 years

Day off during the week of your birthday

R$200 a month for remote work allowance

Mental health support: we cover 40% of the cost of your therapy

Health plan with national coverage and without coparticipation

Dental Insurance: we help you with dental treatment for a better quality of life.

Sports Incentive: R$300/mo extra if you practice activities

Up to R$5.000 bonus for referring new Blue Caps

titulo: Arquiteto de Software/Principal Software Development Engineer
descricao:
O que voc√™ far√°

At Avalara, we don't just work on projects; we embark on journeys that redefine industries and push the boundaries of what's possible. In our latest enterprise, we're not just building an E-Invoicing solution; we're crafting a document exchange platform, a global wide business network to allow customers and their trading partners to exchange data on their business processes. This ambitious endeavor is to automate compliant documents exchange with a performant and scalable platform, a powerful DSL, and cutting-edge workflow orchestration.

Compliant document exchange: Imagine building a platform to allow customers and their trading partners to exchange information that is vital for their businesses, with smart mapping capabilities for any document format required, by simply dragging, dropping, and connecting elements on a visual canvas. It is an effort to design the canvas that enables users coding and testing their integrations seamlessly within a browser, with real-time collaboration features that break down the barriers of traditional development environments.DSL for Unparalleled Customization: This is an opportunity to build our Domain-Specific Language (DSL), that empowers us to define and refine integrations with precision. Your creativity knows no bounds as you shape the language to fit the unique needs of our business processes.Unleashing Automation: It isn't just about connecting applications; it's about automating workflows and processes to empower businesses to do more with less. Picture a world where mundane tasks are handled seamlessly, allowing teams to focus on what truly matters.Collaborative Innovation: Collaborate with like-minded professionals, share your insights, and contribute to the evolution of integration. Your ideas don't just matter; they shape the future of connectivity.Learning Never Stops: It isn't just about delivering a project; it's a continuous learning experience. As part of this journey, you'll have access to cutting-edge technologies, mentorship programs, and professional development opportunities that will propel your career to new heights.


As a key contributor, your role will be pivotal. You'll be at the forefront of designing the Document Exchange platform, shaping the DSL, and refining the workflow orchestration. Your creativity and passion for technology will be the driving force behind an integration revolution.

To design and implement frameworks and features instrumental in building the next-generation document exchange platform.To provide technical leadership for new designs and evangelize best practices and guidelines implementation.To Participate in design discussions, build POC, and contribute to delivering high-quality products/features/frameworks.To ensure the team is not creating technical debts.To Collaborate effectively with team members and expert groups on code reviews and test plans with an eye towards automation.Taking corrective measures to address problems and anticipating problems in new designs and work.Focusing on optimization, performance, security, observability, scalability, and telemetry.To Lead discussions with stakeholders on requirements and design aspects related to critical technical components, frameworks, interfaces, etc.To be an author who documents the exploration's architectural decisions, designs, comparisons, and analysis.To Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and professional growth within the team.


O que precisa possuir para ser bem sucedido

Bachelor/master‚Äôs degree in computer science or equivalent.I have 15+ years of full-stack experience in a software development role, shipping complex applications to large-scale production environments.Expert in C# or Java programming language.Knowledge of architectural styles and design patterns to solve complex problems with simple, intuitive design.Experience in architecting, building, and deploying (CI/CD) highly scalable distributed systems and frameworks for small businesses and enterprises.Experience working on AWS Cloud and DevOps (Terraform, Docker, ECS, etc.) would be beneficial.Experience working in an Agile team with hands-on experience with TDD and BDD.Experience in converting monoliths to microservices or serverless architecture.You should be self-motivated and focus on automating everything.Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills to solve complex problems and critical production issues.Passion to see your product be the best in the business.TOGAF, AWS Solutions Architect, or similar certifications.Knowledge of Enterprise Integration Patterns.Fluent English. Only resumes in English will be considered.


Sobre a equipe

The Engineering team for E-Invoicing and Live Reporting is dedicated to developing the nextgen Document Exchange Platform at Avalara. It is a gliobal team with participants around the globe contribution to this key objective.

Sobre a Avalara

We‚Äôre Avalara. We‚Äôre defining the relationship between tax and tech.

We‚Äôve already built an industry-leading cloud compliance platform, processing nearly 40 billion customer API calls and over 5 million tax returns a year.

Last year, we became a billion-dollar business, and our tribe expanded by a cool thousand people - there‚Äôs nearly 5,000 of us now. Our growth is real, and we‚Äôre not slowing down - not until we‚Äôve achieved our mission - to be part of every transaction in the world.

We‚Äôre bright, innovative and disruptive, like the orange we love to wear. It captures our quirky spirit and optimistic mindset. It shows off the culture we‚Äôve designed, that empowers our people to win. Ownership and achievement go hand in hand here. We instill passion in our people through the trust we place in them.

We‚Äôve been different from day one. Join us, and your career will be too.

You will work closely with a multidisciplinary team of engineers, product managers, and designers. titulo: Arquiteto de Software/Principal Software Development Engineer
descricao:
O que voc√™ far√°

At Avalara, we don't just work on projects; we embark on journeys that redefine industries and push the boundaries of what's possible. In our latest enterprise, we're not just building an E-Invoicing solution; we're crafting a document exchange platform, a global wide business network to allow customers and their trading partners to exchange data on their business processes. This ambitious endeavor is to automate compliant documents exchange with a performant and scalable platform, a powerful DSL, and cutting-edge workflow orchestration.

Compliant document exchange: Imagine building a platform to allow customers and their trading partners to exchange information that is vital for their businesses, with smart mapping capabilities for any document format required, by simply dragging, dropping, and connecting elements on a visual canvas. It is an effort to design the canvas that enables users coding and testing their integrations seamlessly within a browser, with real-time collaboration features that break down the barriers of traditional development environments.DSL for Unparalleled Customization: This is an opportunity to build our Domain-Specific Language (DSL), that empowers us to define and refine integrations with precision. Your creativity knows no bounds as you shape the language to fit the unique needs of our business processes.Unleashing Automation: It isn't just about connecting applications; it's about automating workflows and processes to empower businesses to do more with less. Picture a world where mundane tasks are handled seamlessly, allowing teams to focus on what truly matters.Collaborative Innovation: Collaborate with like-minded professionals, share your insights, and contribute to the evolution of integration. Your ideas don't just matter; they shape the future of connectivity.Learning Never Stops: It isn't just about delivering a project; it's a continuous learning experience. As part of this journey, you'll have access to cutting-edge technologies, mentorship programs, and professional development opportunities that will propel your career to new heights.


As a key contributor, your role will be pivotal. You'll be at the forefront of designing the Document Exchange platform, shaping the DSL, and refining the workflow orchestration. Your creativity and passion for technology will be the driving force behind an integration revolution.

To design and implement frameworks and features instrumental in building the next-generation document exchange platform.To provide technical leadership for new designs and evangelize best practices and guidelines implementation.To Participate in design discussions, build POC, and contribute to delivering high-quality products/features/frameworks.To ensure the team is not creating technical debts.To Collaborate effectively with team members and expert groups on code reviews and test plans with an eye towards automation.Taking corrective measures to address problems and anticipating problems in new designs and work.Focusing on optimization, performance, security, observability, scalability, and telemetry.To Lead discussions with stakeholders on requirements and design aspects related to critical technical components, frameworks, interfaces, etc.To be an author who documents the exploration's architectural decisions, designs, comparisons, and analysis.To Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and professional growth within the team.

The Engineering team for E-Invoicing and Live Reporting is dedicated to developing the nextgen Document Exchange Platform at Avalara. It is a gliobal team with participants around the globe contribution to this key objective.

We‚Äôre Avalara. We‚Äôre defining the relationship between tax and tech.

We‚Äôve already built an industry-leading cloud compliance platform, processing nearly 40 billion customer API calls and over 5 million tax returns a year.

About The Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Staff Frontend Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience developing multi-tenant SaaS solutions and a proven track record in front-end development. This professional will play a pivotal role in innovating and driving the success of our Marketplace team, a vital and strategic component of our global e-commerce platform.

As a Staff Frontend Engineer, you will serve as a technical reference within the team, guiding and providing expertise in front-end development best practices. You will work closely with a multidisciplinary team of engineers, product managers, and designers. You will be responsible for leading significant evolutions in our products to better meet customer needs and seize market opportunities.

Your contributions will directly impact the success and global growth of our organization, offering a truly exciting opportunity to be at the forefront of e-commerce innovation.

Who You Are

You have a solid track record in front-end development. Also, a strong proficiency in modern frontend technologies such as Typescript, GraphQL, CSS3, and frameworks/libraries like React and Next;You have demonstrated experience in a technical guidance capacity, successfully guiding project teams and establishing strategic technical direction;You have experience in software development, maintenance, and evolving large-scale and resilient frontend applications with 24/7 uptime;You are proficient in automated tests, its different types, and strategies;You have a proven track record of delivering high-quality code in a fast-paced, agile environment;You have proficiency in English and Portuguese;You tackle the problems always with a business-oriented approach;You should be based in any Brazilian city;Experience working in commerce solutions is a plus!

About VTEX

VTEX (NYSE: VTEX) is the composable and complete commerce platform that delivers more efficiency and less maintenance to organizations seeking to make smarter IT investments and modernize their tech stack. Through our pragmatic composability approach, we empower brands, distributors, and retailers with unparalleled flexibility and comprehensive solutions, enabling them to invest solely in what provides a clear business advantage and boosts profitability. VTEX is trusted by 2,600 global B2C and B2B clients, including Carrefour, Colgate, Motorola, Sony, Stanley Black & Decker, and Whirlpool, having 3,500 active online stores across 43 countries (as of FY ended on December 31, 2023). For more information, visit www.vtex.com .

Founded in the year 2000, VTEX has a history of being unstoppable. Completely against the odds, VTEX is leading a high-tech industry and positioned above market giants. We are building an extraordinary future with more than 1,700 employees scattered across 18 locations in 12 countries in Latin America, North America, Europe, and Asia.

At VTEX, you will work in a challenge-driven environment and collaborate with amazing peers. If you are powerful individually, join us, and we will be unstoppable together.

Hi! This is Yalo! We are on a mission to bring conversational commerce to the world...

Remember how it used to be to interact with businesses that knew and understood you, that could recommend exactly what you needed, and that with a simple message could get you what you wanted??? We know that traditional SAAS companies focus on first world problems... we don't! Having started in Latin America, our roots are in Emerging Markets and therefore we care about bringing amazing experiences to a population that traditionally has been underserved, such as the small shop owner in Brazil that is ordering online for the first time.

Your mission?

Speaking and written fluency in Portuguese and English (Spanish will be considered a plus)


Desirable Requirements (nice To Have)

Soft Skills That Matter To Us


Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.


What do we offer?

More About Hopper

At Hopper, we are on a mission to become the leading travel platform globally ‚Äì powering Hopper‚Äôs mobile app, website and our B2B business, HTS (Hopper Technology Solutions). By leveraging massive amounts of data and advanced machine learning algorithms, Hopper combines its world-class travel agency offering with proprietary fintech products to bring transparency, flexibility and savings to travelers globally. We have developed several unique fintech solutions that address everything from pricing volatility to trip disruptions ‚Äì helping people travel better and save more on their trips.

The Hopper platform serves hundreds of millions of travelers globally and continues to capture market share around the world. Ranked the third largest online travel agency in North America, the Hopper app has been downloaded over 120 million times and has become largely popular among younger travelers ‚Äì with 70% of its users being Gen Z and millennials.

While everyone knows us as the Gen Z and Millennial travel app, Hopper has evolved to become much more than that. In recent years, we‚Äôve grown into a global travel agency and travel fintech provider that powers some of the world‚Äôs largest brands.

Through HTS, our B2B division, the company supercharges its partners‚Äô direct channels by integrating our fintech products on their sites or powering end-to-end travel portals. Today, our partners include leading travel brands like Capital One, Nubank, Air Canada and many more.

Here are just a few stats that demonstrate the company‚Äôs recent growth:

Hopper sells billion worth of travel and travel fintech every year. In 2023, over 1.3 billion trips were planned through the Hopper app and our HTS partnerships.

Our fintech products ‚Äì including Price Freeze, Flexibility for Any Reason and Flight Disruption Assistance ‚Äì have exceptionally strong CSAT because the terms are always clear, and customers receive instant, no-questions-asked resolutions.

Almost 30% of our app customers purchase at least one fintech product when making a booking; and consumers are 1.6x more likely to repurchase if they add fintech to their booking vs if they booked just travel.

Given the success of its fintech products, Hopper launched a B2B initiative, HTS (Hopper Technology Solutions), which represents more than 50% of the business.

Through HTS, any travel provider (airlines, hotels, banks, travel agencies, etc.) can integrate and seamlessly distribute Hopper‚Äôs fintech or travel inventory on their direct channels. As its first HTS partnership, the company partnered with Capital One to co-develop Capital One Travel, a new travel portal designed specifically for cardholders. Other HTS partners include Air Canada, Uber, CommBank, Nubank, Flair Airlines with many more in the pipeline.

Featured in Apple‚Äôs Best of the App Store list of Essential Travel Apps in 2023 and recognized by the likes of Fast Company‚Äôs Most Innovative Companies, Hopper has been downloaded over 120 million times and continues to have millions of new installs each month. Hopper is now the #3 largest online travel agency in North America and 70% of our app customers are Gen-Z and millennials travelers.

Hopper has raised over $750 million USD of private capital and is backed by some of the largest institutional investors and banks in the world. Hopper is primed to continue its acceleration as the world‚Äôs fastest-growing mobile-first travel marketplace.

titulo: External Fulfillment Project Manager, External Fulfillment
descricao:
Description

The Brazil Operations External Fulfillment (EF Ops) is looking for a Project Manager to lead new product developments, planning cycles, and regular business reviews with senior leadership.

The Brazil Operations External Fulfillment (EF Ops) team is responsible for the logistic of marketplace and works with third party sellers. We seek a Program Manager to lead our product developments and regular business reviews.

Amazon strives to be Earth's most customer-centric company, where people can find and discover virtually anything they want to buy online. Over 2 million Sellers in 10 countries list their products for sale on the Amazon. Sellers are a critical part of Amazon‚Äôs ecosystem to deliver on our vision of offering the Earth‚Äôs largest selection and lowest prices. External Fulfillment (EF) includes a variety of programs in which Amazon works hand in hand with a wide range of Sellers and Vendors to ship product from their warehouse. The EF Ops Program Manager will lead cross-functional initiatives working with teams in Brazil and abroad to design new processes, drive technology solutions and create project documentation and report results to senior leadership. The goal is to deploy impactful improvements that enhance the overall customer experience of the EF program and support our rapid growth.

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. We not only celebrate the diversity of our workforce, we celebrate the diverse ways we work. If you would like to request an accommodation for the interview or onboarding process, please let our team know and we will connect you to our accommodation team.

Key job responsibilities

Key responsibilities include managing multiple projects simultaneously, conducting root cause analysis, and proposing solutions, preparing monthly and quarterly reports. The role requires close collaboration with stakeholders across Transportation, Product, Business, Supply Chain, and other EF teams across the world. The ideal candidate is an analytical problem-solver, organized, able to drive initiatives across teams to arrive at successful outcomes.

As The EF Ops Program Manager, You Will

 Lead the planning cycles for EF OPS proposing mechanisms and tools to scale our operation while improving results and the team¬¥s productivity. Collaborate cross-functionally to identify pain points and scope impactful projects, working with teams across Operations, Finance, Supply Chain, Business, Transportation and Product. Liaise with stakeholders to drive projects, anticipate bottlenecks, provide escalation management, and balance business, operations need with technical constraints. Conduct deep-dive analyses of EF operations pain points, then work with product teams to scope and implement short- and long-term technical solutions. Manage weekly project status meetings and leverage project management tools to track initiatives. Submit weekly, monthly and quarterly managerial reports detailing key program and project updates. Above all, you will be the single-threaded owner responsible for driving your assigned projects to successful completion.

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:

Sao Paulo, SP, BRA

Basic Qualifications

 Bachelor's degree Program or project management experience Experience working cross functionally with tech and non-tech teams Defining and implementing process improvement initiatives using data and metrics experience Knowledge of Excel (Pivot Tables, VLookUps) at an advanced level and SQL Experience defining program requirements and using data and metrics to determine improvements Fluent in Portuguese and Advanced English

Preferred Qualifications

 Experience driving end to end delivery, and communicating results to senior leadership experience Experience in stakeholder management, dealing with multiple stakeholders at varied levels of the organization Experience building processes, project management, and schedules

Company Description

The QIMA story

At QIMA, we are on a mission to offer our clients smart solutions to make products you can trust.

Operating in over 100 countries, we serve the consumer products, food, and life sciences industries and help more than 30,000 brands, retailers, manufacturers, and growers achieve quality excellence.

We combine on-the-ground expertise with digital solutions that bring accuracy, transparency and intelligence for quality and compliance data.

What sets us apart is our unique culture. Our 5,000 Qimers live and make decisions every day by our QIMA Values. With client passion, integrity, and a commitment to making things simple, we disrupted the Testing, Inspection, and Certification industry. Are you ready to hop on this exciting ride with us and help us achieve our mission?

QIMA Food is dedicated to helping every member of the global food supply chain ensure the safety and quality of food products, as well as safe working conditions and sustainable practices. With inspections, audits and certifications, we support food growers, producers and retailers, as well as businesses in food service and hospitality, securing their food products' journey from farm to shelf and fork.

Job Description

Position Overview:

The Strategic Project Manager will collaborate closely with the Food Division teams to define and improve growth strategies, selecting key projects that drive sustainable and profitable expansion.The role involves overseeing internal efficiency projects involving technology and AI, initiating sales development programs, and pursuing external growth opportunities.

Key Responsibilities

Strategic Collaboration and Growth Planning:

Work with the Food Division teams to clarify and enhance the division's growth strategy.Select key projects critical for achieving sustainable and profitable growth.

Project Management

Manage internal efficiency, technology, and AI projects to streamline operations.Launch sales development programs focusing on sales efficiency, new offers, creation of a Key Accounts strategy and new market segments.

External Growth Initiatives

Who We Are

What You Will Do

The Global Segment Project Manager (PM) is responsible for managing priority Innovation and Life Cycle Management projects in direct support of Kenvue‚Äôs and assigned Segment‚Äôs Strategic Plan, Objectives and Key Results (OKRs).

Key Responsibilities

Concurrently manage multiple global product innovation and lifecycle management projects from definition through launch and execution following Kenvue‚Äôs Operating model and innovation playbooks, standards, and tools.

Challenging the Status Quo to Drive Change

Pismo is a disruptive company that knows we can‚Äôt count on what got us here to get us where we want to go. Instead of following trends, our team members create them. Minimum Friction Experience

Collective Power

Delivering Value and Excellence

Focus on People

Software na TRACTIAN

The software department at TRACTIAN is at the forefront of innovation, crafting an integrated ecosystem that revolutionizes maintenance and process management. What You'll Do

As a Quality Assurance Engineer at TRACTIAN, you will play a crucial role in maintaining the quality and functionality of our web and mobile applications. Your responsibilities will involve developing and implementing comprehensive test plans, validating interfaces across web and mobile platforms, and identifying potential issues across a wide range of devices and operating systems. Working closely with development and design teams, you will contribute to delivering a seamless and user-centric experience that aligns with TRACTIAN's standards of excellence on both web and mobile platforms.

Responsibilities

Collaborate closely with development teams to comprehend the architecture and functionality of our apps.

Devise comprehensive test strategies specifically tailored to our apps.

Design detailed test cases and scripts to thoroughly evaluate the app's monitoring interactions and behavior.

Utilize modern testing frameworks and tools like Cypress and Maestro.

Conduct rigorous regression testing on the mobile and web app to maintain feature integrity across updates.

Identify, document, and meticulously track defects and anomalies using dedicated issue tracking tools.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to validate the integration of monitoring features into our apps.

Contribute to the improvement of internal quality assurance processes and methodologies within our environments.

Requirements

2+ years of hands-on experience as a Quality Assurance Engineer, with a strong background in testing robust products that have mobile and web versions.

Proficiency in testing Flutter and React apps components using tools like Cypress, Playwright, Selenium, Appium or Maestro.

Solid problem-solving skills and the ability to identify and isolate issues in complex apps environments.

Excellent communication skills for effective collaboration with cross-functional teams.

Attention to detail and a passion for delivering high-quality results.

Knowledge of monitoring systems, data visualization, and IoT is a plus.

The Senior Salesforce Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex Salesforce-based solutions to support the organization's business processes. Design, develop, test, and deploy high-quality Salesforce solutions, including custom applications, configurations, and enhancements.Customize Salesforce applications to meet specific business requirements, including creating custom objects, fields, workflows, and validation rules.Integrate Salesforce with other systems and applications, both on-premises and cloud-based, using technologies like REST and SOAP APIs.Manage data import, export, and migration tasks, ensuring data quality and integrity within Salesforce.Implement and maintain robust security and access controls to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements.Write efficient, well-structured, and maintainable Apex code, Visualforce pages, and Lightning components to maximize system performance.Stay up to date with Salesforce best practices and new features, and recommend their implementation to improve system efficiency.Lead and mentor junior Salesforce developers, provide technical guidance, and foster a collaborative and productive team environment.Develop and execute test plans, perform code reviews, and ensure the quality and reliability of Salesforce solutions.

titulo: Arquiteto de Software/Principal Software Development Engineer
descricao:
O que voc√™ far√°

At Avalara, we don't just work on projects; we embark on journeys that redefine industries and push the boundaries of what's possible. In our latest enterprise, we're not just building an E-Invoicing solution; we're crafting a document exchange platform, a global wide business network to allow customers and their trading partners to exchange data on their business processes. This ambitious endeavor is to automate compliant documents exchange with a performant and scalable platform, a powerful DSL, and cutting-edge workflow orchestration.

Compliant document exchange: Imagine building a platform to allow customers and their trading partners to exchange information that is vital for their businesses, with smart mapping capabilities for any document format required, by simply dragging, dropping, and connecting elements on a visual canvas. It is an effort to design the canvas that enables users coding and testing their integrations seamlessly within a browser, with real-time collaboration features that break down the barriers of traditional development environments.DSL for Unparalleled Customization: This is an opportunity to build our Domain-Specific Language (DSL), that empowers us to define and refine integrations with precision. Your creativity knows no bounds as you shape the language to fit the unique needs of our business processes.Unleashing Automation: It isn't just about connecting applications; it's about automating workflows and processes to empower businesses to do more with less. Picture a world where mundane tasks are handled seamlessly, allowing teams to focus on what truly matters.Collaborative Innovation: Collaborate with like-minded professionals, share your insights, and contribute to the evolution of integration. Your ideas don't just matter; they shape the future of connectivity.Learning Never Stops: It isn't just about delivering a project; it's a continuous learning experience. As part of this journey, you'll have access to cutting-edge technologies, mentorship programs, and professional development opportunities that will propel your career to new heights.


As a key contributor, your role will be pivotal. You'll be at the forefront of designing the Document Exchange platform, shaping the DSL, and refining the workflow orchestration. Your creativity and passion for technology will be the driving force behind an integration revolution.

To design and implement frameworks and features instrumental in building the next-generation document exchange platform.To provide technical leadership for new designs and evangelize best practices and guidelines implementation.To Participate in design discussions, build POC, and contribute to delivering high-quality products/features/frameworks.To ensure the team is not creating technical debts.To Collaborate effectively with team members and expert groups on code reviews and test plans with an eye towards automation.Taking corrective measures to address problems and anticipating problems in new designs and work.Focusing on optimization, performance, security, observability, scalability, and telemetry.To Lead discussions with stakeholders on requirements and design aspects related to critical technical components, frameworks, interfaces, etc.To be an author who documents the exploration's architectural decisions, designs, comparisons, and analysis.To Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and professional growth within the team.


O que precisa possuir para ser bem sucedido

Bachelor/master‚Äôs degree in computer science or equivalent.I have 15+ years of full-stack experience in a software development role, shipping complex applications to large-scale production environments.Expert in C# or Java programming language.Knowledge of architectural styles and design patterns to solve complex problems with simple, intuitive design.Experience in architecting, building, and deploying (CI/CD) highly scalable distributed systems and frameworks for small businesses and enterprises.Experience working on AWS Cloud and DevOps (Terraform, Docker, ECS, etc.) would be beneficial.Experience working in an Agile team with hands-on experience with TDD and BDD.Experience in converting monoliths to microservices or serverless architecture.You should be self-motivated and focus on automating everything.Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills to solve complex problems and critical production issues.Passion to see your product be the best in the business.TOGAF, AWS Solutions Architect, or similar certifications.Knowledge of Enterprise Integration Patterns.Fluent English. Only resumes in English will be considered.


Sobre a equipe

The Engineering team for E-Invoicing and Live Reporting is dedicated to developing the nextgen Document Exchange Platform at Avalara. It is a gliobal team with participants around the globe contribution to this key objective.

Sobre a Avalara

We‚Äôre Avalara. We‚Äôre defining the relationship between tax and tech.

We‚Äôve already built an industry-leading cloud compliance platform, processing nearly 40 billion customer API calls and over 5 million tax returns a year.

Last year, we became a billion-dollar business, and our tribe expanded by a cool thousand people - there‚Äôs nearly 5,000 of us now. Our growth is real, and we‚Äôre not slowing down - not until we‚Äôve achieved our mission - to be part of every transaction in the world.

We‚Äôre bright, innovative and disruptive, like the orange we love to wear. It captures our quirky spirit and optimistic mindset. It shows off the culture we‚Äôve designed, that empowers our people to win. Ownership and achievement go hand in hand here. We instill passion in our people through the trust we place in them.

We‚Äôve been different from day one. Join us, and your career will be too.

EEO Statement

We‚Äôre an Equal Opportunity Employer. Supporting diversity and inclusion is a cornerstone of our company ‚Äî we don‚Äôt want people to fit into our culture, but to enrich it. All qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, age, gender, national orientation, disability, sexual orientation, US Veteran status, or any other factor protected by law. If you require any reasonable adjustments during the recruitment process, please let us know.

An extraordinarily talented group of individuals work together every day to drive TNS' success, from both professional and personal perspectives. Come join the excellence!

Overview

TNS is looking for a Senior Software Development Engineer with 12+ years of relevant experience. The successful candidate will participate in the TNS Software development life cycle with an emphasis on leading development Team(s), Software Development, Systems Architecture, implementing CI/CD practices and improving the application security for Payment's transaction processing.

Technical responsibilities:

Leads and contributes to high level Payment Application designs, system architecture, and code implementation using Java/Node.js, React, Angular and/or other web technologies as necessary.Ensures that software meets all requirements of Quality, Security, Compliance and Extensibility.Collaborates with peers within TNS‚Äô multiple teams (Development/QA, Products Owners, Sales Engineering and Operations team) to define and implement the functional and non-functional requirements for new and existing software components.Works with the DevOps and other teams to define and standardize tools and methodology around TNS CI/CD strategy.Creates Design, Requirement, Test documentation and software specifications as required.Successfully communicates all concepts and guidelines to development team; mentors development team members to ensure they perform to expected levels.Able to operate with minimal supervision, work within a team environment and demonstrate ability to be an excellent team player.

Agile/Scrum Responsibilities

Technical lead for a Scrum team with diverse team members from US, offshore, and remote time-zones.Develop Sprint backlog of technical stories and tasks from requirements and product backlog.Collaborate with Product Owner and stakeholders in backlog planning and grooming.Estimate level of effort for software projects and develop sprint-by-sprint project plans. Assist team in story estimation within Scrum environment.Implement Scrum/SDLC best practices and coding practices for projects.As a senior technical member, suggest and contribute to continuous improvement of SDLC process.

Required

Hands on experience as a Software Developer on Linux platforms using Java/Node.js, React, Angular and/or other web technologies/frameworks.Proven experience in working with continuous integration and deployment model.Familiar with Agile and DevOps processes.Familiarity with mark-up/tagged languages likes Json, XML, HTML, YAMLFamiliarity with scripting languages like Python, Perl, Bash scripting, JavaScript.Familiarity with Virtualization, Containers, Microservices and Cloud Technologies.4 year College/University degree in Computer Science/Engineering field

Desirable

Payment Industry knowledge E.g. #MidSenior

About The Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Staff Frontend Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience developing multi-tenant SaaS solutions and a proven track record in front-end development. This professional will play a pivotal role in innovating and driving the success of our Marketplace team, a vital and strategic component of our global e-commerce platform.

As a Staff Frontend Engineer, you will serve as a technical reference within the team, guiding and providing expertise in front-end development best practices. You will work closely with a multidisciplinary team of engineers, product managers, and designers. You will be responsible for leading significant evolutions in our products to better meet customer needs and seize market opportunities.

Your contributions will directly impact the success and global growth of our organization, offering a truly exciting opportunity to be at the forefront of e-commerce innovation.

Who You Are

You have a solid track record in front-end development. Also, a strong proficiency in modern frontend technologies such as Typescript, GraphQL, CSS3, and frameworks/libraries like React and Next;You have demonstrated experience in a technical guidance capacity, successfully guiding project teams and establishing strategic technical direction;You have experience in software development, maintenance, and evolving large-scale and resilient frontend applications with 24/7 uptime;You are proficient in automated tests, its different types, and strategies;You have a proven track record of delivering high-quality code in a fast-paced, agile environment;You have proficiency in English and Portuguese;You tackle the problems always with a business-oriented approach;You should be based in any Brazilian city;Experience working in commerce solutions is a plus!

About VTEX

VTEX (NYSE: VTEX) is the composable and complete commerce platform that delivers more efficiency and less maintenance to organizations seeking to make smarter IT investments and modernize their tech stack. Through our pragmatic composability approach, we empower brands, distributors, and retailers with unparalleled flexibility and comprehensive solutions, enabling them to invest solely in what provides a clear business advantage and boosts profitability. VTEX is trusted by 2,600 global B2C and B2B clients, including Carrefour, Colgate, Motorola, Sony, Stanley Black & Decker, and Whirlpool, having 3,500 active online stores across 43 countries (as of FY ended on December 31, 2023). For more information, visit www.vtex.com .

Founded in the year 2000, VTEX has a history of being unstoppable. Completely against the odds, VTEX is leading a high-tech industry and positioned above market giants. We are building an extraordinary future with more than 1,700 employees scattered across 18 locations in 12 countries in Latin America, North America, Europe, and Asia.

At VTEX, you will work in a challenge-driven environment and collaborate with amazing peers. If you are powerful individually, join us, and we will be unstoppable together.

Hi! This is Yalo! We are on a mission to bring conversational commerce to the world...

Remember how it used to be to interact with businesses that knew and understood you, that could recommend exactly what you needed, and that with a simple message could get you what you wanted??? Yep... neither do we. That is why at Yalo we are marrying the scale of digital commerce with the personalization and simplicity of conversations to help companies delight their users.

We know that traditional SAAS companies focus on first world problems... we don't! Having started in Latin America, our roots are in Emerging Markets and therefore we care about bringing amazing experiences to a population that traditionally has been underserved, such as the small shop owner in Brazil that is ordering online for the first time.

If you're looking for a place to make things happen, learn fast, and impact emerging markets in a way that hasn't been done before, look no further. üí´

Come Join us in our mission of improving billions of lives through the power of conversational commerce!

Your mission? 

The mission of this role is to serve as a bridge between our clients and our technical teams, ensuring that the solutions we develop are not only aligned with the clients' business objectives but are also feasible and sustainable within the given constraints of time and budget.

This dual-role professional will manage the entire project lifecycle from initiation through to completion, incorporating business analysis to understand and translate client needs into actionable development plans, and project management to oversee the execution and delivery of these plans. The ultimate goal is to enhance customer satisfaction and drive our company's success by delivering solutions that meet or exceed client expectations.

What are the responsibilities for this role?


Customer Insight: Leads innovative product solutions grounded in a deep understanding of customer needs, helping customers see opportunities they might not readily see.Product Delivery: Drive our customers' roadmaps through the ability to formulate data-driven decisions that lead to overcoming challenges and on-time delivery.Project Delivery: Manage scope throughout the project duration. Maintain accurate program estimates, timelines, project plans, and status reports.Cross-Functional Business Growth: Manage and navigate a complex business environment to foster tight partnerships with multi-disciplinary teams to deliver results for our customers.Communication: Proactively communicate your plan and accomplishments with internal and external stakeholders, identifying risks and ensuring partnership alignment.Initiate and work closely with partners across the organization and participate in cross-functional forums and workshops.Identify and surface resourcing gaps that slow our momentum.Stay updated on delivery methodologies and processes to ensure optimal operation.Work with the internal Engineering, UX Design, and Product Management teams to understand the product and documentation requirements and the business context.Produce high-quality documentation appropriate for an intended audience.

Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering, or a related discipline.+5 years of project management or business analyst experience in the tech industry.+3 years of experience using agile frameworks.+3 years of customer-facing experience. Speaking and written fluency in Portuguese and English (Spanish will be considered a plus)


Desirable Requirements (nice To Have)


+3 years of leadership experience in managing cross-functional teams.Full understanding of software development lifecycle best practices.Drive cross-functional product-related projects.Knowledge of AWS or Google CloudHands-on experience in creating software


Soft Skills That Matter To Us


Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.


What do we offer? 


Unlimited PTO policyCompetitive rewards on the market rangeRemote working is available (-+3 hours CT)Flexible time (driven by results)Start-up environmentInternational teamworkYou and nothing else limit your career here


We care,

We keep it simple,

We make it happen,

We strive for excellence.

More About Hopper

At Hopper, we are on a mission to become the leading travel platform globally ‚Äì powering Hopper‚Äôs mobile app, website and our B2B business, HTS (Hopper Technology Solutions). By leveraging massive amounts of data and advanced machine learning algorithms, Hopper combines its world-class travel agency offering with proprietary fintech products to bring transparency, flexibility and savings to travelers globally. We have developed several unique fintech solutions that address everything from pricing volatility to trip disruptions ‚Äì helping people travel better and save more on their trips.

The Hopper platform serves hundreds of millions of travelers globally and continues to capture market share around the world. Ranked the third largest online travel agency in North America, the Hopper app has been downloaded over 120 million times and has become largely popular among younger travelers ‚Äì with 70% of its users being Gen Z and millennials.

While everyone knows us as the Gen Z and Millennial travel app, Hopper has evolved to become much more than that. In recent years, we‚Äôve grown into a global travel agency and travel fintech provider that powers some of the world‚Äôs largest brands.

Through HTS, our B2B division, the company supercharges its partners‚Äô direct channels by integrating our fintech products on their sites or powering end-to-end travel portals. Today, our partners include leading travel brands like Capital One, Nubank, Air Canada and many more.

Here are just a few stats that demonstrate the company‚Äôs recent growth:

Hopper sells billion worth of travel and travel fintech every year. In 2023, over 1.3 billion trips were planned through the Hopper app and our HTS partnerships.

Our fintech products ‚Äì including Price Freeze, Flexibility for Any Reason and Flight Disruption Assistance ‚Äì have exceptionally strong CSAT because the terms are always clear, and customers receive instant, no-questions-asked resolutions.

Almost 30% of our app customers purchase at least one fintech product when making a booking; and consumers are 1.6x more likely to repurchase if they add fintech to their booking vs if they booked just travel.

Given the success of its fintech products, Hopper launched a B2B initiative, HTS (Hopper Technology Solutions), which represents more than 50% of the business.

Through HTS, any travel provider (airlines, hotels, banks, travel agencies, etc.) can integrate and seamlessly distribute Hopper‚Äôs fintech or travel inventory on their direct channels. As its first HTS partnership, the company partnered with Capital One to co-develop Capital One Travel, a new travel portal designed specifically for cardholders. Other HTS partners include Air Canada, Uber, CommBank, Nubank, Flair Airlines with many more in the pipeline.

Featured in Apple‚Äôs Best of the App Store list of Essential Travel Apps in 2023 and recognized by the likes of Fast Company‚Äôs Most Innovative Companies, Hopper has been downloaded over 120 million times and continues to have millions of new installs each month. Hopper is now the #3 largest online travel agency in North America and 70% of our app customers are Gen-Z and millennials travelers.

Hopper has raised over $750 million USD of private capital and is backed by some of the largest institutional investors and banks in the world. Hopper is primed to continue its acceleration as the world‚Äôs fastest-growing mobile-first travel marketplace.

titulo: External Fulfillment Project Manager, External Fulfillment
descricao:
Description

The Brazil Operations External Fulfillment (EF Ops) is looking for a Project Manager to lead new product developments, planning cycles, and regular business reviews with senior leadership.

The Brazil Operations External Fulfillment (EF Ops) team is responsible for the logistic of marketplace and works with third party sellers. We seek a Program Manager to lead our product developments and regular business reviews.

Amazon strives to be Earth's most customer-centric company, where people can find and discover virtually anything they want to buy online. Over 2 million Sellers in 10 countries list their products for sale on the Amazon. Sellers are a critical part of Amazon‚Äôs ecosystem to deliver on our vision of offering the Earth‚Äôs largest selection and lowest prices. External Fulfillment (EF) includes a variety of programs in which Amazon works hand in hand with a wide range of Sellers and Vendors to ship product from their warehouse. The EF Ops Program Manager will lead cross-functional initiatives working with teams in Brazil and abroad to design new processes, drive technology solutions and create project documentation and report results to senior leadership. The goal is to deploy impactful improvements that enhance the overall customer experience of the EF program and support our rapid growth.

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. We not only celebrate the diversity of our workforce, we celebrate the diverse ways we work. If you would like to request an accommodation for the interview or onboarding process, please let our team know and we will connect you to our accommodation team.

Key job responsibilities

Key responsibilities include managing multiple projects simultaneously, conducting root cause analysis, and proposing solutions, preparing monthly and quarterly reports. The role requires close collaboration with stakeholders across Transportation, Product, Business, Supply Chain, and other EF teams across the world. The ideal candidate is an analytical problem-solver, organized, able to drive initiatives across teams to arrive at successful outcomes.

As The EF Ops Program Manager, You Will

 Lead the planning cycles for EF OPS proposing mechanisms and tools to scale our operation while improving results and the team¬¥s productivity. Collaborate cross-functionally to identify pain points and scope impactful projects, working with teams across Operations, Finance, Supply Chain, Business, Transportation and Product. Liaise with stakeholders to drive projects, anticipate bottlenecks, provide escalation management, and balance business, operations need with technical constraints. Conduct deep-dive analyses of EF operations pain points, then work with product teams to scope and implement short- and long-term technical solutions. Manage weekly project status meetings and leverage project management tools to track initiatives. Submit weekly, monthly and quarterly managerial reports detailing key program and project updates. Above all, you will be the single-threaded owner responsible for driving your assigned projects to successful completion.

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:

Sao Paulo, SP, BRA

Basic Qualifications

 Bachelor's degree Program or project management experience Experience working cross functionally with tech and non-tech teams Defining and implementing process improvement initiatives using data and metrics experience Knowledge of Excel (Pivot Tables, VLookUps) at an advanced level and SQL Experience defining program requirements and using data and metrics to determine improvements Fluent in Portuguese and Advanced English

Preferred Qualifications

 Experience driving end to end delivery, and communicating results to senior leadership experience Experience in stakeholder management, dealing with multiple stakeholders at varied levels of the organization Experience building processes, project management, and schedules

Company Description

The QIMA story

At QIMA, we are on a mission to offer our clients smart solutions to make products you can trust.

Operating in over 100 countries, we serve the consumer products, food, and life sciences industries and help more than 30,000 brands, retailers, manufacturers, and growers achieve quality excellence.

We combine on-the-ground expertise with digital solutions that bring accuracy, transparency and intelligence for quality and compliance data.

What sets us apart is our unique culture. Our 5,000 Qimers live and make decisions every day by our QIMA Values. With client passion, integrity, and a commitment to making things simple, we disrupted the Testing, Inspection, and Certification industry. Are you ready to hop on this exciting ride with us and help us achieve our mission?

QIMA Food is dedicated to helping every member of the global food supply chain ensure the safety and quality of food products, as well as safe working conditions and sustainable practices. With inspections, audits and certifications, we support food growers, producers and retailers, as well as businesses in food service and hospitality, securing their food products' journey from farm to shelf and fork.

Job Description

Position Overview:

The Strategic Project Manager will collaborate closely with the Food Division teams to define and improve growth strategies, selecting key projects that drive sustainable and profitable expansion.The role involves overseeing internal efficiency projects involving technology and AI, initiating sales development programs, and pursuing external growth opportunities.

Key Responsibilities

Strategic Collaboration and Growth Planning:

Work with the Food Division teams to clarify and enhance the division's growth strategy.Select key projects critical for achieving sustainable and profitable growth.

Project Management

Manage internal efficiency, technology, and AI projects to streamline operations.Launch sales development programs focusing on sales efficiency, new offers, creation of a Key Accounts strategy and new market segments.

External Growth Initiatives

Identify and reach out to potential acquisition targets and sellers, presenting QIMA's value proposition effectively.Convincingly communicate the strategic logic to stakeholders.Perform thorough assessments of target companies, evaluating their business and financial profiles.Work closely with the Division CEO and coordinate with cross-functional teams within the division, corporate functions, and target companies to create detailed business and integration plans.Work together with the group's M&A and Legal teams.

descricao:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose ‚Äì  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

Get to Know our Team:

The Data department oversees all of Agoda‚Äôs data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company‚Äôs culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.

The Opportunity:

As a member of the Database Development team, you will engage in database design, data management, and database development, all integrated with automated Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) pipelines. We work in close coordination with product teams, ensuring to offer support and solutions that uphold technical excellence and fulfill business needs.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Design efficient, scalable, and maintainable database architectures, schemas and tablesWrite optimized PostgreSQL queries, SPs and functions to support various requirementsConduct database code review to ensure quality, efficiency, and adherence to best practicesDiagnose and resolve performance issues, including queries, indexing and execution plan analysisTransfer and migrate data from various sources to PostgreSQL, ensuring data integrity and optimizing performanceCollaborate with development teams for seamless database integrationUtilize automated database CI/CD pipelines to streamline the development processLeverage advanced PostgreSQL features to enhance database performance and reliability

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

Minimum 4 years of hands-on experience with PostgreSQL database development and administrationBachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, computer engineering or a related fieldProficient in database design, ER Diagram with advanced knowledge in writing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and functionsDemonstrated expertise in query optimization and analyzing execution plansAbility to prioritize tasks and work under pressure to meet deadlinesCollaborative team player with good interpersonal and communication skillsBe able to attend on-call rotation

It‚Äôs Great if you have:

PostgreSQL certification is a plusExperience with GitLab version control systems and containerization with DockerFamiliarity with Agile development methodologiesFamiliarity with NoSQL databases and concepts for handling unstructured data

This position is based in Bangkok, Thailand (Relocation Provided)

Job Summary

The Senior Salesforce Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex Salesforce-based solutions to support the organization's business processes. This role requires deep expertise in Salesforce development, customization, and integration, as well as the ability to lead and mentor a team of developers.

A Senior Salesforce Developer is a key player in leveraging Salesforce to drive business success, and they are expected to have advanced skills and the ability to guide and mentor junior team members.

You‚Äôll Have The Opportunity To

Job Description

 Kenvue is currently recruiting for Global Segment Project Manager. This position reports into Sr Director, Global Segment Operations and will be based out of Kenvue offices in Brazil 

Who We Are

At Kenvue , we realize the extraordinary power of everyday care. Built on over a century of heritage and rooted in science, we‚Äôre the house of iconic brands - including NEUTROGENA¬Æ, AVEENO¬Æ, TYLENOL¬Æ, LISTERINE¬Æ, JOHNSON‚ÄôS¬Æ and BAND-AID¬Æ that you already know and love. Science is our passion; care is our talent. Our global team is made by 22,000 diverse and brilliant people, passionate about insights, innovation and committed to deliver the best products to our customers. With expertise and empathy, being a Kenvuer means to have the power to impact life of millions of people every day. We put people first, care fiercely, earn trust with science and solve with courage ‚Äì and have brilliant opportunities waiting for you! Join us in shaping our future‚Äìand yours. For more information click here.

What You Will Do

The Global Segment Project Manager (PM) is responsible for managing priority Innovation and Life Cycle Management projects in direct support of Kenvue‚Äôs and assigned Segment‚Äôs Strategic Plan, Objectives and Key Results (OKRs).

Key Responsibilities

Concurrently manage multiple global product innovation and lifecycle management projects from definition through launch and execution following Kenvue‚Äôs Operating model and innovation playbooks, standards, and tools.

In service of assigned Brand Development Team(s) (BDT), provide overall project management to a global cross-functional team including R&D, Marketing, Packaging, Operations, Finance, Regional PM, and others to deliver on project goals (time, cost, quality. Support team members by resolving execution barriers, raising issues as appropriate and engaging ultimate decision makers as quickly as possible when projects deviate from plan.

Owner of the overall project execution plan including inputs to scope, business case, schedule and launch timing. Oversee and drive team activities to deliver project objectives in a compliant and reliable manner. Coordinate team meetings and minutes; understand & track critical milestones; establish contingency & acceleration plans; facilitate team decisions and issue resolution; establish and implement risk management plan.

Uses strong business knowledge, technical skills, and sound judgment to effectively assess risk, develop contingency and mitigation plans, and elevate issues. Lead preparation and delivery of project updates, stage-gate reviews, and recommendations at governance forum. Acts as an independent advisor at the forum, making appropriate Go/No-go recommendations and communicating openly and effectively about risks and issues.

Develop an in-depth understanding of assigned Segment/Brand/Need State‚Äôs strategy, business goals, associated technologies, and supply chain to support sound decision making from chartering through design and development to launch, resulting in market successful products and reliable, cost-effective supply chain(s).

Utilize project metrics and lessons learned to improve business results, processes and tools and build project management capability through coaching and supporting other PMs and participating in Community of Practices.

Maintain accurate information and data supporting project and portfolio tracking and reporting to ensure appropriate visibility at all organizational levels. As required, support Operations BDT Leads and Project Management BDT one point-of-contacts with project update or other ad hoc data requests.

Role may have additional responsibility of being a Project Management point-of-contact for a Brand Development team (BDT), providing project management input during project ideation and feasibility, and acting as a liaison between the Brand Development Team(s) and broader global and regional project management community as required.

Required qualifications-

 A minimum of a Bachelor's Degree  Minimum of 8 years of business/work experience.  Minimum of 5 years of project management experience, with at least 3 years of proven success in management of new product commercialization or life cycle management projects from ideation through to benefit realization.  You can successfully interact across all levels of the organization, leading discussions and holding teams accountable without line authority, creating alignment across cross-functional partners (Commercial, R&D, Operations, Regional PM and others) as needed.  The successful candidate will be an excellent communicator, verbally, in writing and through presentations, reports and dashboards, with ability to distill complex issues and risks into succinct comprehensible analysis and open and transparent recommendations for senior leaders (up to VP).  Strong business and financial competence, with an understanding of financial principles and project evaluation methods, and how to use this knowledge to make recommendations to achieve business goals.  You are an inclusive team leader, with proven track record of inspiring and delivering results through others with trust and empowerment, constructively challenging cross-functional partners enhance collective success.  You thrive with ambiguity and can act as a change agent, adapting quickly to changing business dynamics, solving with courage to shape and build new ways of working.  The candidate will have a proven track record of meeting project objectives in fast-paced environments by successfully managing, tracking, and implementing successful strategies in regard to scope, quality, time and cost.  Must be able to work independently and without direct line management authority over team members.  Must be accountable, work well under pressure and have strong time management and prioritization skills.  Must be comfortable challenging status quo and looking for ways to improve ways of working processes. 

Desired qualifications-

 Master‚Äôs Degree or MBA or other advanced degree  PMP certification and/or other industry and project management certification  Experience working in Consumer Goods industry.  Experience in a GMP or regulated environment (Pharmaceutical, Medical Device, OTC)  Experience in Process Excellence / 6 Sigma methodologies

About The Role

We are seeking a Field Software Engineer to join our Customer Experience (CX) team. This role is ideal for a professional with over 2 years of experience as a web developer or related role and proficiency in the JavaScript stack, including frameworks such as React, Next.js, Node.js, and GraphQL.

As the primary interface between VTEX and our customers, the Field Software Engineer will guide customers to optimize their use of the VTEX platform, ensuring they leverage its full potential. We are looking for a technology-driven individual, an exceptional problem solver with good communication skills, and the ability to ask probing questions to validate applications and find bugs.

You will work in the CX Team and close to the Success teams, supporting customers with complex implementation issues and debugging technical scenarios, always being proactive. A self-taught mindset, committed to finding the best solutions for our customers, is essential.

Responsibilities

Provide timely and effective solutions to customers issues through Zendesk ticketing system, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.Analyze and troubleshoot technical problems, collaborating with customers' and partners' teams when necessary.Contribute to the creation and maintenance of documentation and functional requirements guides to assist customers and partners.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure a seamless customer experience and the successful resolution of technical challenges.Continuously update knowledge of VTEX platform features and capabilities to provide expert guidance to customers.

Who you are

Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.Proficient in JavaScript or TypeScript, with deep knowledge of HTML and CSS.Knowledge in React and Next.js.Experience using REST APIs and knowledge of GraphQL.Experience with Postman or similar API development tools.Debugging experience using JavaScript-based tools such as Chrome Developer Tools.Problem-solving skills and analytical thinking.Good communication and collaboration skills.Willingness to learn new technologies and adapt to changing requirements.Understanding of SEO principles and front-end website performance optimization is a plus.Experience with VTEX Commerce platform and Zendesk or similar customer support platforms is a plus.Digital commerce experience (preferred).Advanced English knowledge (preferred).

About VTEX

VTEX (NYSE: VTEX) is the enterprise digital commerce platform where global brands and retailers run their world of commerce. VTEX is trusted by more than 2,400 customers, such as AbInbev, Carrefour, Colgate, Motorola and Whirlpool, with over 3,200 active online stores across 38 countries*.

Founded in the year 2000, VTEX has a history of being unstoppable. Completely against the odds, VTEX is leading a high-tech industry and positioned above market giants. We are building an extraordinary future with more than 1,500 employees scattered across 18 locations in 12 countries in Latin America, North America, Europe, and Asia.

At VTEX, you will work in a challenge-driven environment and collaborate with amazing peers. If you are powerful individually, join us, and we will be unstoppable together.

What We Do

What To Expect In This Role

We are seeking an experienced and talented Lead Fullstack Engineer specializing in React to join our growing team. As a Lead Fullstack Engineer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and delivering high-quality software solutions across our web and backend systems. Your expertise in React will be instrumental in building scalable, responsive, and intuitive applications that meet our business objectives.

Pismo is a techfin providing a cutting-edge processing platform for card issuing, digital accounts, wallets, merchant management, and other next-gen payment solutions. We currently process millions of accounts for fintechs and large banks worldwide, from Latam and expanding into European and Asian markets, who launch next generation products using Pismo‚Äôs resilient and innovative infrastructure.Pismo‚Äôs growing list of innovative offerings include:

Pismo‚Äôs platform allows its customers to control everything from client acquisition to account management.Digital Banking & Wallets: Pismo provides a transaction banking core for modern digital banking experiences, from easy client acquisition to enriched cash-in / cash-out operations and internal transfers / P2P transactions.Seller Management: From the onboarding to the daily management of each seller, Pismo‚Äôs platform runs a workflow process with pertinent settlement and commercial parameters for each transaction, such as MDR, clearing rules, settlement requirements, and days to pay. Our core values Responsibility & Commitment


Responsibility and Commitment are key tenets of Pismo's business. In all of our interactions, ethics and honesty serve as guiding principles. Transparency and alignment are essential at Pismo to foster a culture of accountability where people do not take shortcuts and dare to be vulnerable. We encourage ownership and enable our employees to be a part of the solution to our challenges.

Challenging the Status Quo to Drive Change

Pismo is a disruptive company that knows we can‚Äôt count on what got us here to get us where we want to go. Instead of following trends, our team members create them. We strive for the best solution for every situation, not the easiest. Taking the ordinary or common sense route is insufficient. This is how we affect real change.

Minimum Friction Experience

Pismo's success depends on fluid, clear, and careful internal and external communication. Our solutions should address issues directly rather than causing new ones. We understand that learning and development is a positive outcome of necessary friction. We want our customers and employees to have a pleasant experience free of bureaucracy.

Collective Power

Pismo isn't simply mine, yours, or some other team's. All of our people have a good purpose for being here. Each of us, in our way, has the freedom to be ourselves and know we are accepted. Pismo values being a multicultural organisation. We are stronger, more efficient, and happier when we operate as a team .

Delivering Value and Excellence

Constant development is essential as it allows us to supply high-quality products and services while ensuring that we always bring value to our clients. Pismo recognises the importance of new information in breaking down boundaries and forging new possibilities. We pave the way and set trends by developing market-leading solutions.

Focus on People

People are a company's most valuable asset. That is why we prioritise attracting and hiring the best people, followed by personal and professional development. We invest in people's growth and empower them to take charge of their careers. We value work-life balance because we understand how difficult it can be to distinguish between work and life.

Why join us

TRACTIAN is reimagining industrial systems so that every frontline maintenance worker can realize their full potential. We're building software and hardware in one place‚Äîdisrupting long-standing institutions with products and experiences that better serve the ambitions of our clients.

Working at TRACTIAN allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. Our team members have the autonomy needed to accomplish challenging goals. We are a growth-stage startup and you will work directly with the founders, helping to define the vision, product and user experience.

Software na TRACTIAN

The software department at TRACTIAN is at the forefront of innovation, crafting an integrated ecosystem that revolutionizes maintenance and process management. Comprising a dynamic team of experts, the department develops an all-in-one software solution that seamlessly combines predictive maintenance capabilities with a comprehensive Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS). This visionary approach empowers maintenance and process teams with a unified platform, enabling them to proactively predict equipment failures, optimize maintenance workflows, and enhance operational efficiency. In daily work the software department drives the convergence of cutting-edge technology and maintenance excellence to propel businesses toward unparalleled success.

What You'll Do

As a Quality Assurance Engineer at TRACTIAN, you will play a crucial role in maintaining the quality and functionality of our web and mobile applications. Your responsibilities will involve developing and implementing comprehensive test plans, validating interfaces across web and mobile platforms, and identifying potential issues across a wide range of devices and operating systems. Working closely with development and design teams, you will contribute to delivering a seamless and user-centric experience that aligns with TRACTIAN's standards of excellence on both web and mobile platforms.

Responsibilities

Collaborate closely with development teams to comprehend the architecture and functionality of our apps.

Devise comprehensive test strategies specifically tailored to our apps.

Design detailed test cases and scripts to thoroughly evaluate the app's monitoring interactions and behavior.

Utilize modern testing frameworks and tools like Cypress and Maestro.

Conduct rigorous regression testing on the mobile and web app to maintain feature integrity across updates.

Identify, document, and meticulously track defects and anomalies using dedicated issue tracking tools.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to validate the integration of monitoring features into our apps.

Contribute to the improvement of internal quality assurance processes and methodologies within our environments.

Requirements

2+ years of hands-on experience as a Quality Assurance Engineer, with a strong background in testing robust products that have mobile and web versions.

Proficiency in testing Flutter and React apps components using tools like Cypress, Playwright, Selenium, Appium or Maestro.

Solid problem-solving skills and the ability to identify and isolate issues in complex apps environments.

Excellent communication skills for effective collaboration with cross-functional teams.

Attention to detail and a passion for delivering high-quality results.

Knowledge of monitoring systems, data visualization, and IoT is a plus.

Your mission?

This dual-role professional will manage the entire project lifecycle from initiation through to completion, incorporating business analysis to understand and translate client needs into actionable development plans, and project management to oversee the execution and delivery of these plans. The ultimate goal is to enhance customer satisfaction and drive our company's success by delivering solutions that meet or exceed client expectations.

Customer Insight: Leads innovative product solutions grounded in a deep understanding of customer needs, helping customers see opportunities they might not readily see.Product Delivery: Drive our customers' roadmaps through the ability to formulate data-driven decisions that lead to overcoming challenges and on-time delivery.Project Delivery: Manage scope throughout the project duration. Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering, or a related discipline.+5 years of project management or business analyst experience in the tech industry.+3 years of experience using agile frameworks.+3 years of customer-facing experience. Speaking and written fluency in Portuguese and English (Spanish will be considered a plus)


Desirable Requirements (nice To Have)


+3 years of leadership experience in managing cross-functional teams.Full understanding of software development lifecycle best practices.Drive cross-functional product-related projects.Knowledge of AWS or Google CloudHands-on experience in creating software


Soft Skills That Matter To Us


Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
